metadata.title: removing href from an SVG image

image.href: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='50' height='50' ><rect width='50' height='50' fill='red'/></svg>

svg.script: async function test() { await waitForAtLeastOneFrame(); document.querySelector('image').removeAttribute('href'); await waitForAtLeastOneFrame(); takeScreenshot(); }
